title: Developing Self-Regulated Learning Strategies in Online Assessment: Utilizing Peer Feedback and Chatbots

context.prior_knowledge: Basic structure of academic writing and experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Learners Collaborate with Peers in a VR Simulation Environment Using Personal Devices and Interact with an AI Chatbot. Assessment Activities Focus on Academic Essay Writing and Peer Feedback

learning_goals: Learners can improve the logical structure of academic essays in two or more ways using peer feedback
Learners can implement self-regulated learning strategies through a chatbot at least three times and analyze the results
Learners can apply time management and goal-setting strategies with 80% or higher accuracy during online assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
